content.raw:
I think you sorted this out, but just for reference: the problem here was not a shared/static mismatch, as it is perfectly fine to mix static and shared libraries. 

The one thing that needs to be consistent is that the different libraries should use the same run-time library compiler option [1]. 

[1] : https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj889284.aspx
content.html:
I think you sorted this out, but just for reference: the problem here was not a shared/static mismatch, as it is perfectly fine to mix static and shared libraries.

The one thing that needs to be consistent is that the different libraries should use the same run-time library compiler option [1].

[1] : https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj889284.aspx

content.raw:
I saw a compiler error related to qwt, then remembered that @\_jrivero_ had been testing an updated version of qwt, which I've switched to in 826fbe5, 8cd931f. It requires [release-tools pr 421](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/421/use-newer-version-of-qwt-for-gazebo/diff).

The [latest test build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1715) now fails with a ~~FreeImage~~ Qt5 linking error.
content.html:
I saw a compiler error related to qwt, then remembered that @_jrivero_ had been testing an updated version of qwt, which I've switched to in 826fbe5, 8cd931f. It requires release-tools pr 421.

The latest test build now fails with a FreeImage Qt5 linking error.

content.raw: Thanks very much for the help!

The error seems to be 
~~~
gazebo_physics.lib(MultiRayShape.cc.obj) : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static class ignition::math::Angle const ignition::math::Angle::Zero" (?Zero@Angle@math@ignition@@2V123@B) 
~~~
It should have been fixed by https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/164/change-name-to-the-generic-building_dll/diff , but perhaps the ignition-math used for the build is not updated. 
See #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2262/symbol-visibility-issues-in-windows for a more general discussion on the problem, and the related PR : #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2700/remove-preprocessor-definition-of/diff .
content.html:
The error seems to be 

gazebo_physics.lib(MultiRayShape.cc.obj) : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: static class ignition::math::Angle const ignition::math::Angle::Zero" (?Zero@Angle@math@ignition@@2V123@B)

It should have been fixed by https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/164/change-name-to-the-generic-building_dll/diff , but perhaps the ignition-math used for the build is not updated. See #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2262/symbol-visibility-issues-in-windows for a more general discussion on the problem, and the related PR : #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2700/remove-preprocessor-definition-of/diff .

content.raw: I just noticed that I submitted the fix just for the `default` branch of ign-math (i.e. ign-math4) while Gazebo is still using ign-math3 . It should be easily back-portable.
content.html: I just noticed that I submitted the fix just for the default branch of ign-math (i.e. ign-math4) while Gazebo is still using ign-math3 . It should be easily back-portable.
